title: Forgotten Lore
story: The faint scent of aged paper lingers in the air, stirring forgotten memories within the castle's walls. Some secrets are best left undisturbed.
effect: During this Day phase, whenever a hero performs a Memory Search, they may choose to draw 3 face-down cards instead of 2. If they choose to do so, they must immediately roll a D6. On a result of 1 or 2, a random Vampire Sister (Mary, Sade, or Luci) immediately moves 2 steps directly towards the hero's current location, drawn by the psychic ripples of the disturbed past.
